title: (x) italic serif face, similar to Garamond - Granjon {Mike F, Jan E}
content:
It seemed to be a Garamond, but it is none of the ones I have. Can anyone give me a positive ID?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230205im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pea_5980.gif)

 [‹ (x) Deco-ish caps "Brooklyn Cyclones" - Cholla Sans {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230205/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36722 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Flared Art Nouveau font on "Monsieur" book cover - Hercules/Herkules {Mike F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230205/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36715 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze
